subject: Re: [sugar] New activities proposals due today...
body:
On Tuesday 19 June 2007 12:14, Jim Gettys wrote:
JG> As you know, we're coming up on feature freeze on our next
JG> major set of Trial software.  If you are developing an
JG> activity you'd like to see available as part of the trial,
JG> please let us know today so we can have some insight into
JG> its state.
JG>                             Best regards,
JG>                                       - Jim

Could I add "Localization insight" to the request? There's a 
growing group of people trying to setup and coordinate the l10n 
effort...


Cheers,
Xavier

-- 
XA
